body: Pretty sure this has an animated adaptation

The plot direction went from strange to stranger. I would rather liked if Miu kept her feeling for Haruka and made her her own woman. But oh well, she went from Kuudere to a crazy cum slut. I suppose this is what they both wished for. It had good potential, but went over the board. ^^ 3/5.
Bad concept, rape bad ending... Erect sawaru
